# JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy

**Enumeration**

The strategies for encoding nonconforming floating-point numbers, also known as IEEE 754 exceptional values.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy
```

## Overview

The IEEE 754 floating-point specification defines exceptional values, which include [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/FloatingPoint/infinity] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/FloatingPoint/nan].

## Exceptional Values

- **JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy.convertToString(positiveInfinity:negativeInfinity:nan:)**: The strategy that encodes exceptional floating-point values from a specified string representation.
- **JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy.throw**: The strategy that throws an error upon encoding an exceptional floating-point value.

## Encoding Exceptional Numbers

- **nonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy**: The strategy used by an encoder when it encounters exceptional floating-point values.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
